verses.name: John 7:6
verses.text: Then Jesus said unto them, My time is not yet come: but your time is alway ready.

verses.name: John 7:7
verses.text: The world cannot hate you; but me it hateth, because I testify of it, that the works thereof are evil.

verses.name: John 7:8
verses.text: Go ye up unto this feast: I go not up yet unto this feast; for my time is not yet full come.

verses.name: John 7:9
verses.text: When he had said these words unto them, he abode still in Galilee.

verses.name: John 7:10
verses.text: But when his brethren were gone up, then went he also up unto the feast, not openly, but as it were in secret.
